remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要關聯事件與事件處理常式，將加入至事件的委派的執行個體。To associate the event with the event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派從事件，每當事件發生時，就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate from the event. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 處理`SendMailError`事件可讓您的 Web 應用程式繼續執行，即使當嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息時，就會發生例外狀況。Handling the `SendMailError` event allows your Web application to continue running, even if an exception occurs when trying to send an email message. 比方說，這是很有用，如果使用者正在透過多步驟的精靈時，就會發生例外狀況。For example, this is useful if the exception occurs when a user is working through a multi-step wizard. 最好是將錯誤記錄、 顯示資訊訊息給使用者，並允許使用者完成精靈，而不是終止應用程式。It is preferable to log the error, display an informative message to the user, and allow the user to complete the wizard rather than terminate the application. 如果您未建立的事件處理常式事件，或如果您建立事件處理常式，卻留下屬性設定為`false`Web 應用程式會停止執行時傳送電子郵件，發生錯誤時，ASP.NET 會顯示錯誤訊息。If you do not create an event handler for the event, or if you create an event handler but leave the property set to `false`, your Web application will stop running if an error occurs when sending an email message, and ASP.NET will display an error message. 方法也可讓衍生的類別，以處理事件，而不是。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event instead of the . 這是衍生自的類別中處理事件的慣用的技巧或。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a class that is derived from or . 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about handling events, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendMailError`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendMailError`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 來傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這在完成`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the `SendingMail` event handler. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP
